item.title: CDK CodePipeline
item.description: It took me almost a day to figure out how to fix a problem with deploying a pipeline with CDK. The build stage was alwayis running into an error: [Container] 2021/03/01 08:02:29 Entering phase PRE_BUILD [Container] 2021/03/01 08:02:29 Running command npm ci npm ERR! archiver not accessible from aws-cdk npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in: npm ERR! /root/.npm/_logs/2021-03-01T08_02_34_128Z-debug.log [Container] 2021/03/01 08:02:34 Command did not exit successfully npm ci exit status 1 [Container] 2021/03/01 08:02:34 Phase complete: PRE_BUILD State: FAILED [Container] 2021/03/01 08:02:34 Phase context status code: COMMAND_EXECUTION_ERROR Message: Error while executing command: npm ci.

item.description: Today I’m very thankful for having good friends. We were out in the forest for a walk and afterwards sitting in the park. We had very good conversations. It’s nice to hear how they’re really doing in these crazy times. Tonight in my Italian practice I learned how to use the adjective vicino and how to conjugate the verb andare.

item.title: Svelte and the Great Space Elevator
item.description: After the speach of Shawn Wang at the JS World Conference this week, I had to watch his video called Svelte and the Great Space Elevator{:target="_blank"} tonight. I absolutely can recommend it. But for now, I have nothing more to say, that I’m really curious about Svelte and its possibilities. I have to look into it… You will find further links in his video description.

item.title: Allowed function parameters in TS
My first post
item.description: A first blog post Hi there. This is my first blog post. Actually, I’ve got no clue what to achieve and where to end up with this blog. I’m doing just for myself. Kind of a diary. To document where this journey called life leads me to. To be honest, I’m not even really sure about what the content is going to be about. I think I’m going to write down what ever keeps me busy.
About Hi there. I’m Andreas, a developer from Switzerland.
